mapper.select: SELECT prd_code, sub_category_code, prd_name, prd_maker, prd_gender, prd_age, prd_style, prd_regular_price, prd_discount_price, prd_brif_explain, prd_detail_explain, prd_inventory, prd_sales_volume, prd_main_image FROM product WHERE sub_category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY prd_code DESC;
